faqs.question: What are the documents required at the time of admission at Apollo University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Following is the list of documents required at the time of admission at Apollo:SSC/ 10th, Intermediate / +2 Mark sheetBachelor’s Degree Consolidated Mark Sheet, Provisional Certificate / ConvocationMigration, Conduct and Transfer CertificateAadhar Card

faqs.question: Does Apollo University provide scholarship facilities to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.The scholarships at Apollo University Chittoor are awarded to the meritorious first year students of UG ang PG courses.Students with above 90% or above 9.5 CGPA will be awarded 25% of the tuition fee.Students who have obtained above 80-89% marks or 8-9 CGPA will be awarded 15% of the tuition fee.

faqs.question: Does Apollo University provide accommodation to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Apollo provides accommodation assistance on request only.

faqs.question: How to apply for the courses at Apollo University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidates can visit the official website of Apollo University and submit the registration form.

Section.name: About The Apollo University
Section.description:
Established in 2016 under the aegis of the Apollo Hospitals Group, Apollo University offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the field of Medical Science across various specializations. Primary consideration in the university’s admission process is given on the scores obtained by the candidate in their last qualifying examination.
The Apollo University, Chittoor offers B.Sc, M.Sc, MSW, MPH courses. Following are the details of the same.
Check: Apollo University Chittoor Courses and Fees
